CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Hong Kong Pharma Digital Technology Holdings Limited

Address.label: Address
Address.value: ROOM B1, 5/F.,WELL TOWN IND. BUILDING,13 KO FAI ROAD,YAU TONG, KOWLOON, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hong Kong Pharma Digital Technology's offering consists of two main categories: (i) OTC pharmaceutical cross-border e-commerce supply chain services, primarily conducted through our Hong Kong subsidiary, Joint Cross Border and (ii) OTC pharmaceutical cross-border procurement and distribution, primarily conducted through our Hong Kong subsidiary, V-Alliance. Through our engagement with OTC pharmaceutical suppliers, logistics companies, and merchants who operate stores on Chinese e-commerce platforms, Joint Cross Border offers a convenient one-stop solution for Mainland Chinese customers who wish to access OTC pharmaceutical products outside Mainland China.
